DataElement.preferredName: CTC Adverse Event Follow-up Report Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the date related to CTC adverse event follow-up report.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Common Terminology Criteria for Adverse Events Follow-up Report
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to CTC adverse event follow-up report.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Common Terminology Criteria for Adverse Events
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A standard terminology developed to report adverse events occurring in cancer clinical trials.  Common terminology criteria for adverse events (CTCAE) are used in study adverse event summaries and Investigational New Drug reports to the Food and Drug Administration.  The CTCAE contain a grading scale for each adverse event term representing the severity of the event.

Concepts.longName: Common Terminology Criteria for Adverse Events
Concepts.definition: A standard terminology developed to report adverse events occurring in cancer clinical trials.  Common terminology criteria for adverse events (CTCAE) are used in study adverse event summaries and Investigational New Drug reports to the Food and Drug Administration.  The CTCAE contain a grading scale for each adverse event term representing the severity of the event.

Property.preferredDefinition: The process by which information about the health status of an individual is obtained after a study has officially closed.:A short textual account; having provided a short account.

Concepts.definition: The process by which information about the health status of an individual is obtained after a study has officially closed; an activity that continues something that has already begun or that repeats something that has already been done.
A short textual account; having provided a short account.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition:
any unfavorable symptoms, signs, or disease temporally associated with the use of a medical
treatment or procedure that may or may not be considered related to the medical
treatment or procedure.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
